channel.title: CVE Feed for n/a -- Linux Kernel (mctp)

item.title: CVE-2023-3439|2023-07-02T00:00:00 -- n%2Fa -- linux%20kernel%20%28mctp%29
item.description: A flaw was found in the MCTP protocol in the Linux kernel. The function mctp_unregister() reclaims the device's relevant resource when a netcard detaches. However, a running routine may be unaware of this and cause the use-after-free of the mdev->addrs object, potentially leading to a denial of service.
